review_text: Madeline's place was just what our family needed for a relaxing memory making weekend. The lake right out the back door was amazing. The kids, both old and young, all really enjoyed the kayaks, pedal boat and the flat bottom boat. It was much different than being on a big lake where you have to worry about motorized boats coming through. Plus, it was very peaceful with not many people around. There are some beautiful sunsets over the lake, as well. I can't say how peaceful and relaxing it was on that deck! The house was great, too. Everyone loved pool and pingpong and the arcade games. It's a short 10-15 minutes to restaurants, as well as Kroger and Walmart, so that was a plus. I can't say enough good things about our stay! Everyone wants to know when we are going back!

Spacious, clean lake retreat. This rental is a gem. So much space inside & out. Kayaks & pedal boat provided along with life jackets. Plenty of seating indoors & outdoors. This worked perfectly for our family. Definitely recommend, you will not be disappointed.

The house is incredible and having such easy access to the lake was amazing. Would highly recommend to large groups of people who love late night campfires, floating out on lakes, and a homely feeling house.
Just what you want in a rental. Everything was clean, house was very nice with great scenery. Neighbor was very nice as well.

This is our 2nd year here so you can imagine how much we like the place to come back. The hosts were responsive, kind & flexible with our schedule. The house is clean and spacious and the kitchen is fully equipped. We needed to bring very few things. Since we were there at New Year's we didn't use the lake, but the location is gorgeous and peaceful. The kitchen/gathering area is great for our group to hang around with each other and we rarely turned on the TV because the space was so inviting to just "hang with each other". The bedrooms are clean, comfortable and flexible. If you have small kids, you should be aware of the stairs, but our grandsons loved going to the basement and playing the "vintage" video games (man am I old that these games I played in HS are now "vintage" (Pac-Man, Galaga, DigDug)).
We brought firewood and kept a fire going each day and enjoyed S'mores and just time around the fire drinking hot chocolates. The deck has been rebuilt and it is spacious & welcoming
It was exactly as described. It was a shame on our part we couldn’t enjoy the amenities they had to offer. The beds were very comfortable and bathrooms were very accommodating….
We absolutely loved our time at this location. It was so gorgeous looking out at the lake in the mornings and evenings. A very nice place.
Enjoyed our stay and found it very relaxing.
We had an AMAZING family reunion and this house was perfect for everyone. We enjoyed the games, fire pit, kayaking, and fishing. There were plenty of bathrooms and bedrooms. Thank you!

Overall was a great experience, just have to mention that one of the neighbors had two dogs that it seemed not very friendly to people every time we were outside they’ll be barking at us ,,, other than that was pretty good we enjoyed it ..
Madeline is an excellent host and her home is a great place to stay. The lake view is gorgeous. 10/10
This house was so beautiful, the whole family enjoyed this vacation and stay!
Outstanding place, spotless and beautiful

This was my second stay here and my family and I absolutely love this house! We bring our 85 yr old father here to fish because the water is easy to access and he doesn’t have to worry about others crowding his space or having traverse steep hills or stairs to get close to the water.
I wish I could stay here year round. It’s a beautiful and spacious home located in a quiet, cozy neighborhood. The hosts are great; they provide clear concise instructions and are extremely responsive to questions.
Pics were exact! Extremely easy to enter! Fun and comfortable home! Hosts were very responsive!

Our hosts were super nice and responded quickly to questions. The house was perfect for our family and the open kitchen created a lot of memories of sitting around the island and talking while preparing food. I genuinely cannot think of any negatives and was so appreciative of our experience. We may even try a summer weekend together! :)
Great amenities.
Super place for a family stay in Tullahoma! Fully stocked with all the toys to enjoy the home and lake out your back door. Thank you hosts!
The view was gorgeous and the house was better than expected.

The lake house was the perfect place to unwind and relax for our family for a long weekend. We grilled out, enjoyed the view of the lake on the big porch and had plenty of space to spread out. Kayaking on the lake was a highlight. It was the perfect home for a lake retreat with a group.

We loved our stay for a long weekend. Perfect place for a group of families to get together and relax. We loved kayaking and fishing on the serene lake, enjoying the beautiful weather on the porch, and campfire with s’mores in the evening. The kitchen was well stocked with cookware for us to cook for a large group. And the pool table, ping pong table, arcade games, and nice variety of board games were a hit as well. Would definitely come back again!

Absolutely everything we anticipated based on the description. All of the available watercraft really made our stay! The fishing was pretty good as well. Also a short drive to 2 beautiful waterfalls in the area. Quaint sleepy little town to just get away from it all. Stayed 4 nights and didn't get into even half of the games and activities this house has to offer. We had a great stay and would highly recommend!
Great place for a family outing. Lots of games, kayaks, paddle boats etc.

Loved the house!! It was clean, comfortable and spacious. Perfect for our larger group with plenty of areas to sleep and hangout. We were never bored with all the lake toys, board games, ping pong, pool table, and arcade games! We had everything we needed and had so much fun with family.

We had 14 people in our group and never felt crowded. We kayaked almost daily on the lake,it was so relaxing and enjoyable sitting on the deck overlooking the lake, grilling. They had so many amenities we couldn’t use them all. The location was good for me- it was close enough to Nashville, yet minutes from hikes, gorgeous waterfalls, and winery/distillery. Our entire group enjoyed themselves! Would highly recommend for big groups with families wanting to have an enjoyable, and relaxing vacation.

Beautiful location! We had a large group of family (12) staying for a nearby wedding & we had plenty of space to stretch out. The view is incredible and we took full advantage of the kayaks to enjoy the lake close up. Peaceful with plenty of room to enjoy outside between all of the decks, fire pit, & large back lawn. We had a wonderful time staying here!

What an Amazing and Beautiful home directly on a Gorgeous lake. The house was spotless and has special touches all over. The kitchen is big and well stocked. There were so many activities both inside and outside that after a week we still didn’t get to everything. We were a huge group and we never felt on top of each other because the house had a great layout. Thank you for your hospitality, we will be back often.

Awesome place! My family, which ranged in age from 14 to 84 all LOVED THE PLACE. In fact, we are trying to see if we can arrange another trip for later in the year. The home had lots of space and there was lots of things to do. The property was beautiful and the view of the lake was great. Plenty of cooking utensils on hand and so many other extras were supplied; it was just like having your own things at home. We enjoyed fishing and seeing the wildlife . We saw a fox 2 mornings in a row and also deer, geese and herons.
Most of all we just feel blessed by the opportunity for family bonding and making memories in such a great place.
Thank you so much for allowing us to share your beautiful home!
Donna and Family
Wonderful spot for a getaway! House was full of amenities, everything we needed. Beautiful spot on a quiet cove. We just had a blast! SERENITY NOW!!!

Beautiful and comfortable home. Perfect for our large family.
Many things to do. Of course, the lake, then the nearby waterfalls, a great playground close by, and can't forget shopping.
A very big THANK YOU!!!

This beautiful home is huge and it was absolutely perfect for our family trip. The kitchen is fully stocked. Our host was responsive and maintained great communication with us during our stay. The location is perfect and feels secluded although you are just a few minutes away from anything you need to do in town.

Serenity Now lake house is amazing. I organized a short, last minute corporate retreat here and it was ideal. The house is large enough that everyone had room to spread out and not be on top of each other.
Communication with Madeline was great. The key was exactly where she said it would be. The kitchen is fully stocked. The living room is comfortable and it was easy to cast to the TV for presentations. The Game Room is super cool.
Outside is amazing. There are kayaks, canoes, and a paddle boat. The sunset is perfect over the lake. The view of the homes on the other side of the lake is very calming. Most of our meetings took place in the sunroom looking out that way.
I highly recommend this house for either a small corporate event or a vacation.
Clean, peaceful, perfect. Thank you for a great stay!

Wow, what can I say about this place. This place was amazing. My wife and I ventured to Tennessee to view lots of waterfalls. Kim's place has a wonderfull sounding creek flowing in the back yard and the falls just down the road is simply amazing. Could easily spend a whole day there. The place was clean, stocked with snacks and foods. Simply amazing. My wife and I were very excited to be able to stay so close to a flowing creek and waterfall. We are both very excited to hopefully visit again soon. We would stay here over and over again. Everything was super easy, and Kim was very helpful with technical support and recommendations.
Thank you so much for opening your lovely Airbnb. Super cute, functional, peaceful, and amazing.

We loved Kim's place...she had everything covered....extras of every little thing we could have forgotten to bring. It was very nicely decorated, extremely clean in every way and so peaceful and quiet. The greenery and being right by the stream was absolutely perfect for our getaway weekend! We look forward to staying here again in the future.

This place was a little piece of heaven. Kim went above and beyond to make this a beautiful place to stay. The snacks and drinks she left were above and beyond what one normally gets at an Airbnb. I loved sitting out on the patio and just listening to the river. I highly recommend this place to anyone!

Kim's place is located next to a beautiful creek & very close to some amazing trails. The room was very clean ,comfortable & stocked with everything we needed and more . Would definitely recommend Kim's place and we definitely plan on visiting again.

Beautiful location. The creek was wonderful. We enjoyed coffee every morning on the deck. Kim has thought of everything a traveler would need …and more. This is the most completely stocked place we have stayed. We will definitely visit here again.

This is a beautiful location, right on the creek. Very peaceful and serene. Had a binder with recommendations on things to do. Rutledge Falls is beautiful and literally minutes from the home. Very clean and put together. Everything was as described!
The view from the porch is just absolutely amazing. Kim was such a great host. Everything was absolutely how she said it would. Thank you again for sharing your amazing space with us.

“It’s the journey, not the destination” is one of many inspirational quotes found in this beautiful AirBNB. I find myself contesting this quote after arriving at my destination here. This is the best airbnb I’ve ever been to. The location is surreal. I feel like I’ve stepped out of my car into a fairytale land with a waterfall, succulents and moss abound. We are looking forward to making this our go to spot when in the area in the future. Stellar home and host. Everything you could think of needing is easily found within the home. So many great snacks! Even fun activities for kids. My son and I had a great time reading, coloring, painting, and swinging together. The energy of this home and area is unmatched. The rain did not deter the fun. We were outdoors as much as possible. Rutledge Falls are phenomenal! We walked for hours and made a wonderful friend on our path. Wishing we stayed longer, can’t wait to come back!
Great location; beautiful hiking around the area. The place itself was peaceful and very enjoyable.
Kim and Jessica are superb host, very thoughtful with all the extra amenities in the apartment and we hope to be back again!

Very nice place. Exactly as described and she has all you need there. Very easy check in and check out. The most relaxing outdoor seating area, & very close to an easy hike/walk to a beautiful water fall.

My boyfriend, pup and myself had a lovely 2 night stay here. So many comforts and needs included… I forgot my toothbrush at home, and there was a new one in the drawer for me! It was such a peaceful and comfortable place to stay while we saw shows at the caverns. Our pup loved the creek area, and we had such a relaxing time with a fully stocked kitchen, super comfy bed and double recliner, which I loved to curl up in.

What a wonderful , cozy and peaceful place!
This is one of the very best Airbnb stays I’ve ever had! The stocked refrigerator, the comfortable recliner and beds, the books and so very clean! - just fantastic!
But the creek and the swing were the best. Just what my soul needed. Thank you, Kim and Jessica, for providing the his calming oasis. I will definitely be back.
Kim was an exceptional host. Her place was beautiful with well-appointed personal touches both indoor and outdoor. Great communication. Wonderful stay.

I have stayed with Kim several times. She is an amazing host and her place is by far the best Airbnb that I have stayed. Beautiful space! Attention to so many details! Coffee, snacks, drinks, creamer… the most stocked kitchen I have experienced! Outside is as incredible as inside! I highly recommend her place and will visit again!

We arrived around 10 PM. The door to enter is in the back of the house. There was plenty of light in the parking area and at the door. We felt right at home. The beds are very comfortable. We loved waking up to the sound of the creek. We used the gas grill which was in good shape. We enjoyed walking to the Rutledge Falls from the driveway. We plan to stay here again!

Stayed at Kim’s place to be closer to distilleries..Jack Daniel …Uncle Nearest. Seeing the running water right in front of house is what hooked me. It’s beautiful !!!! So refreshing, so relaxing. To our surprise we open the fridge to see it filled with possible necessities we would need. Thank you so much!! It’s frustrating to arrive somewhere and be so thirsty and there’s never at least one bottle of water. Also, my husband is a type 1 diabetic, so hem his sugar for low guess what, the juice and cereal was the perfect snack to get him regulated. Place was clean and perfect for us two. And I always travel with pods and dryer sheets, but she had some if needed, which is very considerate. Thank you for thinking of what people may need/miss when traveling ! Would stay here again and hopefully will when we return !

Staying at Kim's place was an absolute delight! The serene atmosphere and peaceful creek flowing nearby made for a truly rejuvenating experience. From the moment we arrived, we were impressed by the thoughtful personal touches throughout the home. Kim's attention to detail was evident in every corner, from the cozy decor to the array of breakfast options provided for us to enjoy.
One of the highlights of our stay was the thoughtful consideration for our furry friend. Kim had supplies available for our dog, ensuring that we had everything we needed if we forgot anything. It's rare to find such pet-friendly accommodations, and we appreciated it immensely.
Overall, our time at Kim's place exceeded all expectations. We left feeling refreshed, relaxed, and grateful for the wonderful hospitality. We highly recommend this tranquil retreat to anyone seeking a peaceful getaway with all the comforts of home. Thank you, Kim, for a memorable stay!

This place is amazing. Cozy little basement apartment with a view of the creek. It had everything we needed and Kim is such a gracious host. We needed a place last minute and it was ready for us. Our stay ended up being nearly 2 weeks.

Kim's place was absolutely flawless. We felt like we were home and it was very cozy and comfortable. We really appreciated all the little things like having coffee, creamer, a few options for breakfast and snacks and just supplies in general. I definitely recommend this retreat. The creek was so serene to listen to and we walked to the nearby waterfall.

WOW! what an outstanding property, in every possible way. I don't know if I have ever been in an Airbnb that is 5+ Star (really 10+!) in every category. The location is ideal, perfect for being in nature, yet close to any store/restaurants anyone may want. Sitting on that porch drinking coffee, watching my dog play in the creek that runs out back.... priceless. Inside was spotless, so extremely beautiful and clean. I was blown away by how comfortable and homey it was, the vibe is just perfect. The hosts have thought of everything! For more than expected, I could literally have brought nothing with me for this stay and would have had everything I needed. Thank you Kim and Jessica, I'm already trying to figure out when I can return and stay a lot longer.
Went for a work trip and really enjoyed not staying in a hotel. Really appreciated the atmosphere, location, and comfort.
Nice place for a getaway. Lots of snacks and basic utensils to use for staying and close to local stores and restaurants.
Love this cozy retreat by the creek and Rutledge Falls! A last minute booking and Kim was so responsive. The space is adorable, very clean, and fully stocked. I will certainly stay again!
This place is absolutely stunning! And Kim left so many personal touches around that I can’t even name them all. If you’re looking for a relaxing getaway, this is the place!
Great stay!

This little place was amazing. My best friend and I traveled to Tullahoma, TN for a wedding. I grew up exploring the falls and this gave me an opportunity to show my best friend where I grew up. The house was so easy to find even at night. The area was quiet and so relaxing to sit outside and enjoy the sounds of the fall season.
Kim is an amazing host and has everything you could think of. I would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to anyone visiting the area.

The view was lovely and the stream so relaxing. The multiple spots to hang out by the stream (hammock, swings, tables and benches) were great. Wish it had been cold enough to light a fire in one of the fire pits. The kitchen and bathroom had everything I needed. And the fridge and pantry were generously stocked with treats, drinks, breakfast items, and basics like milk and butter. The beautiful fall decorations inside and out were cheerful and uplifting. The icing on a perfect retreat. Kim was delightful, and made sure I didn’t miss out on the nearby falls.

I cannot say enough about this hidden gem! I knew nothing about this town when I booked it. I booked only on the description pictures and reviews and WOW! 5 stars across the board. Beautiful area excellent location and lots of beautiful hiking rather close to the Airbnb. And the complementary items? Kim has thought of everything lol. And dog friendly just made it even better ! I’ve stayed at many air bnb this one is the absolute best one ever! Already looking to come back! Top notch!
Even if you are not choosing her place for hiking, you absolutely must see the waterfalls that is located across the street from the property on the short hike. Absolutely amazing and doable for anyone.!!!

Kim and Jessica’s Airbnb was by far the best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at. I’m not one for “relaxing” out of my home, I get so homesick, but I was so comfortable here. It was easy to kick back and destress. We kept busy with porch singing, going hiking at Rutledge, and a fire at night. This place is gorgeous, peaceful, so worth the price, and just a 10 min drive from town! We will be back, and we’ll be recommending to our family coming to visit. Thank you!!!!
It was perfect for a getaway. I felt extremely welcomed and pampered

Awesome place surrounded by nature. The creek, waterfalls nearby, distilleries, and restaurants were all great. The apartment was spotless and had everything needed. We can’t wait to go back. This place and host is highly recommended.
What a wonderful time we had! Sitting on the back porch sipping coffee and listening to the babbling brook. So very very peaceful. Highly recommended.
Enjoyed our stay. Everything is will stocked. Enjoyed the porch and the sounds of the water.
Very nice, relaxing vacation.

I referred to Kim's rental as the "little apartment" as I was showing the pictures off to friends and family before out trip. It did not disappoint! The first thing you notice is what you hear, water. Soft in the distance and constant. Very relaxing. Having coffee on the porch swing, listening to the creek and watching the antics of the tiny birds that frequented the strategic bird feeder near the porch was our kind of fun. The kitchen was great, having all the comforts of home. The bed was so comfortable, we slept several nights with the window open being lulled to sleep by the serenade of the crickets outside. It was very cozy & well appointed with fresh towels, linens and blankets. Our 5yr old Granddaughter had so much fun on the swings. The small one on the porch was just her size and the rope swing over the creek was great, even Grandma had a turn! We sought out Rutledge Falls. Kim had great directions and it was an amazing site to see and hike down to the creek bed. Loved it!

This place is truly a gem! It would be a bargain at twice the price! The location is so gorgeous and peaceful! You can just walk down the creek to Rutledge Falls, if you want. Everything is set up so well to encourage relaxation and enjoyment. Kim has really gone out of her way to set up everything to be so hospitable and have everything you might need to enjoy your stay!

We had a wonderful time at Kim’s Creekside guest sweet. The place was spotlessly clean, well stocked, and felt warm and cozy. We felt right at home immediately. It served us perfectly during our trip and was a great location between Chattanooga and Nashville, as well as Lynchburg for touring the Jack Daniel’s distillery. Can’t recommend Kim’s place enough. Wouldn’t hesitate to book with Kim again in the future!
Everything was perfect. She goes above and beyond to give the best experience. Didn’t need a thing. We were definitely recommend and go back.
Nice cute little apartment under host house. It was extremely clean and well cared for. The creek right outside the door was so relaxing.

Kim was amazing! Place was beautiful and so was the surrounding area. Definitely recommend getting out and exploring the the area as there are some breathtaking falls right down the road. If you are looking for a peaceful nature filled place look no further! Highly recommend and we can’t wait to go back!
What a wonderful place to relax. It was amazing. I look forward to returning. Thank you.

Kim’s place is a beautiful location by a creek and within walking distance to Rutledge Falls. The apartment is cozy and a great place to relax or focus on work. This was my second time staying there and I would stay again.

My husband and I such a awesome, peaceful time it was so relaxing. The place was absolutely beautiful inside and out. She goes completely out of her way to make it feel so cozy and definitely thinks of anything you might need and it’s there. The place was super clean and just beautifully created. We’ve only been home 4 days and I’m already ready to go back. Charming little town and just feels as though you stepped back in time. Everyone you met was so nice and welcoming just all the way around made you feel right at home !!! Thank you so much for putting this together, so many will enjoy your beautiful place !!!

Our recent stay at this perfect little creek side studio was nothing short of amazing! Our host was informative and the property was easy to find. Upon arrival we,of course, did some grocery shopping only to find she had stocked the fridge with little necessities incase something was forgotten. She even had lots of plant based options for all lifestyles. It was incredibly clean and decorated with lots of love. There was even a little kid bed area that had so many cute things for the children to stay entertained if needed. We didn’t bring our kid this trip but would of been very comfortable if he had come. There just is nothing left unthought of, dog bowls and treats, bathroom toiletries, all the kitchen supplies you need. Everything. You won’t need to worry about going without, she has everything there. It’s conveniently located too and there is a book with lots of recommendations. Not to mention walking distance from a gorgeous waterfall that is easy to get to!
Atmosphere is one with nature! Absolutely stunning

My wife and I took our 2 boys for a weekend trip to Rutledge falls and we had a blast! Kim and Jess were totally awesome, quick response, so friendly, and the place had everything plus more than was listed online.
The back of the apartment is so peaceful and completely private!
I will definitely be staying with Kim again on our next trip to the falls.
Would absolutely come again!!!! 10/10!!
Enjoyed our stay. Will be back again soon.

My second time to stay here. Wow, what a beautiful location! A wonderful place to pause and take a break, surrounded by nature. Apartment has everything you need and more. Spotless. Helpful to have some basic food items and snacks already there. Kim is easy to work with, incredibly responsive. I hope to stay again soon.

My fiancee and I recently embarked on a long-distance move, and after weeks of stressful packing, we were desperately in need of a respite. Fortunately, we discovered the most tranquil Airbnb along our 800+ mile journey, providing us with the perfect opportunity to unwind and recharge before tackling the remaining unpacking challenges that awaited us at our new home.
From the moment we arrived, we were instantly captivated by the serenity and privacy of this delightful retreat. Tucked away in a peaceful location, surrounded by nature's beauty, it felt like our own little slice of paradise. The stress of the move melted away as we entered the cozy sanctuary, and we knew we had made the right choice.
We chose to do our own thing and had minimal interactions with Kim, but we also enjoyed the comfort of knowing that she was available should we have needed anything or had any questions about the local area. This place is special and we hope to stay again sometime in the future.
Loved it

We were very happy with our stay at Kim’s. The space was beautiful. The location was perfect for our event. The porch with the sounds from the little creek in the back made for a peaceful spot to enjoy morning coffee or a glass of wine and read a book. What really blew us away was all the small touches the Kim left to make our stay easy…milk and cream for our coffee, snacks, toiletries. We got in late and I did not feel the need to go out to find anything. It was all right there!

Kim‘s place quickly rose to our number one most favorite Airbnb of all time! It is very comfortable, quiet, serene, welcoming, private, and isolated, right on the creek away from the noise! Kim provided little snacks and other Amenities, such as coffee, creamer and milk, ice cream and cereal. It’s evident that she is a very thoughtful person. She also has impeccable, decorating sense and thought of absolutely everything, including a nook for a teen. To hide away and read a book.
Kim’s place is so amazing that we are already planning a return trip with a longest stay!

What a peaceful, beautiful spot. Kim was a fantastic host and completely responsive to texts and questions. The second bed is in what we thought was a cute little nook, and it is part of the bathroom/laundry room without a door, so no privacy for the bathroom when someone is in the second bed. Luckily that was ok for us, but good to know ahead of time. This was the perfect weekend getaway with peace and quiet. We loved it. We both commented we had never been in such a well stocked and thoughtfully done Airbnb. Kim has thought of everything from what you might need in the kitchen to walking sticks on the back porch, etc. We loved our stay!
Beautiful location, amazing price! The apartment exceeded expectations

Kim did a great job of hosting. We felt right at home, with great surroundings and it's a wonderful place to visit with the creek right in the backyard. There were eggs, bagels, and other items provided for a nice breakfast and snacks. We would highly recommend!.

We had a great stay. The creek was so relaxing They had chairs tables firepits. Inside anything you might have forgotten you will find and much more. I will say the host have thought of everything. A must is a walk to the falls Beautiful. Would stay there again. kuddo kim and Jessica you have a great place

My husband and I had a great getaway here. We loved the outdoor space and all the thoughtful touches. Kim has thought of everything to make your stay pleasant. House was very cozy. It was nice to hike to Rutledge falls from the house, although the hill is a doozy on the way back up. Conveniently located between Tullahoma and Manchester. Short springs was a beautiful area for hiking and the Thai food at short springs village was delish!

This is a special place. So very comfortable and listening to the water from the massive porch was euphoric. I unplugged, hung out in the porch swing, put my toes in the creek, walked nature trails with my pup and totally relaxed. Hosts are super thoughtful about snacks and edibles having thought of nearly everything, down to the half dozen of eggs and bagels! What a treasure this space is, I didn’t want to leave.

Kim’s place was more beautiful than the photos. The view, the creek, the outdoor furniture made for a very relaxing stay close to nature. It had everything we needed including bagels, coffee, milk, drinks, condiments, snacks, toiletries and so much more! It had stuff for kids like books, crayons, games. It even had dog essentials like bowl, mat, pee pads and treats! We felt right at home. It is not very clear in the photos, but the 2nd bed (twin bed) is located by the bathroom/laundry. We highly recommend Kim’s place.
Beautiful home with amazing scenery!

We absolutely loved Kim's place. We could have just sat on the porch the entire time and been completely content. The sound of the stream and the birds chirping made for a beautifully relaxing environment. Kim has thought of everything, so many thoughtful touches. It's apparent she cares about her guests' experience. We will definitely be back!

We loved everything about this place. This is an amazing getaway for any anyone! It was very quiet. The view and the sound of the creek are amazing and so peaceful to listen to even from the front porch. The inside was very clean and simple. We cooked every night and they have everything needed to cook a nice meal with. We took our dog babies with us as well and they loved everything about it, its so hard to fine people that are ok with our fur children and Kim is amazingly accommodating with our fur babies, we had no issues at all. Overall, I fully recommend 10 out of 10!!!!!!!

We loved our stay so much we hope to make it back again! The suite is very comfortable and the kitchen is stocked well for cooking or grilling on the porch. We spent most nights and mornings on the porch enjoying the sounds of the river. The path to the river and down by the river was such a bonus! We felt like we were on a retreat! Thank you for making our stay so special!

The location was perfect for our waterfall road trip. We enjoyed grilling and having dinner with a fire by the water. In the mornings, we had coffee on the patio. So peaceful and perfect. Even fun swings to sit on. Jessica also helped arrange the cutest decorations to surprise my boyfriend for his 30th. If we’re ever in the area, we’d for sure stay here again.
This is a nice place in a beautiful area! The kitchen was fully stocked for cooking! The hosts are responsive and kind.
Beautiful and would stay again!

It is an amazingly peaceful place with the stream right outside offering a great spot just to sit, listen to the running water, and breathe in the crisp cool air. She offered a king list of activities to do in the area with distances or drive times to each. She was very responsive the checkout process was very easy!
Perfect for us.
This place was amazing and we had a great time. I can't wait to come back if they will have us. I was really blown away by the whole experience.
Can’t wait to come back and stay again! The place was great and the hosts were amazing too!

Kim’s place was amazing. Very clean and very thought out based ones individual occasion. We went for our anniversary and there was champagne on the bar for us. “Thank you”.
We had all the privacy you could ask for. The place was beautiful and I loved the well thought out positivity all throughout the space. It was clean and she thought of everything you might forgot.
We loved the creek behind the house! The sound of the running water and the popping of the fire was so peaceful.
I’m glad we chose Kim’s place and will definitely be back!

Kim’s place was magical and even better than the pictures. Thoughtful touches inside and outside, like the two-person recliner, multiple fire pits, and swing. The creek was so peaceful, and I really enjoyed yoga on the back porch at night. We had coffee by the creek in the morning, and it was lovely. If you’re a light sleeper and stay during the wintertime, I’d recommend ear plugs, as the sound of the heater fills the space. Even with that, I wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again.

We love staying here - my son lives 2 miles away (walkable).
Already booked for March -- Thank you Kim for our Home away from Home!!

Definitely one of the best places we have stayed. If we weren’t just passing through I would have stayed longer to explore and enjoy the area. So cozy, comfy, and accommodating. Easily one of the better accommodations listed on Airbnb. Great location if you’re looking to get out of the city but still within easy reach of multiple attractions in the surrounding towns. Julie was very helpful with recommendations. Cherry on the top was small touches inside the accommodation to make you feel at home (coffee, snacks, toiletries if you left anything behind).

Our stay was perfect. We had a wonderful time! My boy saw his first waterfall, mountain, concert, and got to hold a baby goat. It will be a trip he will always remember. I’m grateful for our hosts allowing that to happen!

WOW! My family and I had the best experience. My daughters got to feed the horses, goats and cows and a bull.
Julie was always responsive, Herb and Haley gave us a personal tour of the farm and intro to all the animals and the history of the farm.
We'll be back! An experience that won't be forgotten.
We had a great time! Julie was a fantastic host, and maybe we'll be back sometime! Highly recommended

What a wonderful 40th anniversary we spent at the DreamCatcher Farm! Julie was a friendly and helpful host with great suggestions on things to do, however, the time spent with the animals on the farm were the highlight of our stay! The apartment is quiet with all the amenities and then some. Julie made our long weekend getaway so special and unforgettable! We are already planning another trip in the Summer; I have sent the link to friends, too! We will be back, Oliver, Sweetpea, Rocky, and Reese!

We loved our time there. We came to middle TN because it’s one of our favorite places to visit. Julie’s house is located in Tullahoma but very close to Manchester, where we visited Old Stone Fort. They left us a nice card on the counter and the next day, they took us around their farm and showed us the animals. Then we just sat and talked to them for a while. Very easy to talk to and very friendly. We enjoyed our conversations with Julie and Herb. It was a lovely little house, with everything you need. Very clean. Lots of nice touches, like water and snacks. We will always remember our visit there and we thank you very much for everything. God bless.

Thank you to Julie and family for always making our stay at The Barn the highlight of our trips to Tullahoma. We got an extra special treat this time getting to know the baby goats.
Thank you for always making us feel so welcome! We absolutely love The Barn from the cleanliness to the hospitality, we couldn’t ask for more! Til next trip!

Our stay was definitely a relaxing one! Great location, near so many outdoor activities. Even staying in was so peaceful and accompanied by some great little and big friends! The goats, cows, horses, cats, and dogs were so welcoming as well as the hosts :)
For sure will be back during the warmer months to swim in the nearby water! If you don’t stay here. You’re missing out!
This was such a nice place to stay! Julie was very nice and quick to respond with any questions! We would definitely love to stay here again.

I was hesitant to book an Airbnb, my last few stays were not what was expected. But Julie was a gracious and welcoming host. Their little hideaway is perfect for a weekend getaway. Our day and a half there felt like 3 or 4 because we were able to slow down and relax. 10/10

We were extremely satisfied and the attention to detail was outstanding….. better than a 5 star hotel. We loved the animals and felt right at home. I was taken back by the personal touches. Thank you Julie for having us as your guests !!!!! We will definitely return.

This is by far the best Air Bnb we’ve ever stayed at! Julie was an amazing host, everything was as it said it was in the listing. The area is very peaceful, but not to far from numerous things do in the area. If you’re planning to visit the Tullahoma area, you NEED to stay here!
Getting to meet the Baby goats was the icing on the cake!

We loved our stay at the farm!! The baby goats were so adorable! We loved seeing them every morning. We look forward to staying there in the future if it’s available and will recommend to friends coming to the area!
We really enjoyed this get away from the world and would love to visit again! Had lots of recommendations of things around the area to do. Very peaceful.

This was without a doubt my favorite place I've stayed so far. From start to finish you can see the thoughtful attention to detail that Julie puts into everything. The unit itself is actually incredibly spacious and functional ~ it's also squeaky clean but still feels super cozy and comforting... and the best part... what you're surrounded by...rolling acres of gorgeous land with friendly farm animals at every turn. It truly is one of the most revitalizing, peaceful and pure places I've stayed at... needless to say will be back again :) Thank you Julie for providing such a special experience!
Above and beyond care and service to make our stay very special!

The Barn was located at a very peaceful location, off the beaten path, and near our planned family reunion/Thanksgiving get together. The unit had all the amenities one would need, and Julie thought of many other details that you typically don't find in an AirBNB, such as extra toiletries, phone cords next to each side of the bed, and extra batteries just to name a few. Julie was very responsive, before, during, and after our stay. We have family in the Tullahoma area, and we will certainly be booking the Barn again for our future outings.

This was a surprise weekend away for my husband. He had no idea until we got there. The place was quiet and peaceful. LOVED the farm animals!!! Julie was very helpful from the time I booked the reservation. She suggested a great restaurant for the special occasion and made sure we had clear directions to find the "barn."
Will definitely stay here again!!!
By far the cleanest and friendliest Airbnb that I have stayed in. I would stay here again, clean and cozy absolutely perfect for a couples getaway.

My husband and I enjoyed celebrating our 15th anniversary at the Barn at Dream Catcher Farm. The place was clean, cozy, and comfortable. The decor made it feel nice and homey. Julie was very responsive in communicating with us and even went out of her way to set up the fire pit for us and provided stuff for us to make s'mores. Feeding the animals was a fun experience. There are several hiking trails and waterfalls nearby. My favorite part though was Lettie, one of the barn cats. She was the sweetest thing ever! She spent the first evening curled up in my lap at the fire pit, purring away, making biscuits, and giving me kisses. We would definitely love to come visit again. Perhaps next time there will be some baby goats as others have mentioned in their reviews.

Julie was a wonderful host. She suggested many cool places to visit, places to eat, and checked in on us throughout the visit to make sue we were comfortable. She even gave us some treats to feed the goats and cows. The "barn" (I use it loosely because it is quite nice)is very nice and updated. There is a nice kitchen and large bathroom. Plenty of space for the two of us to be comfortable. We even had a nice rainy day staying inside and watching a football game.
We stayed here for a concert at The Caverns music venue. It is about a 30 minute drive but a very easy one straight down the highway. I really don't think there would have been anything of this quality any closer to it.
There are beautiful sunsets every night across the fields and we got so many laughs watching the goats.
All around a wonderful, quiet weekend getaway. Will definitely stay here again if I am in the area.

We visited Tullahoma to see family and stayed at The Barn. Julie made our trip perfect. The location was great, The Barn was amazing. Super clean, well stocked, so cute and comfy. The highlight while staying at The Barn was feeding the goats, horse, and cow. Thank you for making our trip complete!

Dream catcher Farm is like something you see in the movies. It was super clean, super happy animals and beautiful scenery! Julie is an excellent host and very communicative! Me and my fiancé wished we could’ve stayed a bit longer to take it all in since we were there for a local event and didn’t have time to mosey around the Farm. 10/10; absolutely recommend!!
Really nice couple on a beautiful lot with awesome animals. The place was immaculate, well decorated, full kitchen, and comfy! Wish I could stay here again but it's always reserved!!

We had an amazing stay out in the Barn. Our timeframe didn’t allow for much of a chance to see the animals on the ranch other than their super friendly cat. She? I think? greeted us home nearly every night. Coffee was provided and they also left a gift that was appreciated on our late arrival. Everything was clean and they had a comfy Murphy bed. Overall, we enjoyed ourselves and we will be back!

What a wonderful stay! My mom lives in Manchester and I was thrilled to find The Barn which is five miles from my moms’ home.
Thank you Julie for so many thoughtful touches and for your incredible responsiveness each time I reached out. My husband joined me on this trip, but in the future, when I visit by myself, I will not hesitate to stay here alone. An added bonus was the precious little kitten that would greet us each time we arrived back at The Barn and the cow that seemed to watch us each time we headed down the drive, almost like he was saying goodbye. Lol. We slept amazingly well while we were here. Thank you Julie, for your obvious thoughtfulness and opening up your amazing property to guests like us.
We absolutely loved staying here! It was clean and very nice. We definitely recommend staying here! Its not to far from everything. we had no issues with check in or out!

Southern hospitality at its best! Within five minutes after arriving, we were holding baby goats—what a treat!! Loved the family and their willingness to be helpful in outstanding recommendations for an area we enjoyed visiting. The hosts provided lots of extra items we were not expecting—our midnight snacks were a welcome treat! We had a short stay but will definitely be back!

We had such a nice relaxing trip at the Dream Catcher Farm! Julie and her family were so accommodating and we had a nice time chatting with her sweet fam and petting the baby goats around the fire pit! they also gave us wonderful recommendations on where to go and great local eateries! Rutledge Falls and Machine Falls are a must see, especially in the summer if you are looking for a nice swimming hole. We also had a wonderful day in Lynchburg eating at Mary BoBo’s and touring Jack Daniels distillery. We would love to stay again if we are ever back in the area!
We had a great stay! We appreciated the privacy, quietness, and convenient location.
We loved staying at the Barn! Not only was it so clean but Julie was so responsive and such a great host! We will definitely look forward the next time we are down.

Dreamcatcher Farm was an absolutely beautiful and peaceful stay. The hosts were extremely friendly and stopped to say hello when I arrived. They even let me hold the baby goats (definitely a highlight of the stay!). The farm is so charming with all of its friendly animals. The barn itself is extremely clean and equipped with everything you need for a home away from home. Julie was even kind enough to help me right away with the TV when I couldn’t figure out the Internet. Also, I was super excited that a few great hikes were only minutes away from this location. It really was perfect and I can’t wait to come back.

We stayed at The Barn while seeing two concerts at The Caverns. The location of the Air B&B was a short drive away. The place was immaculately clean. There were provisions in case you forgot something and it was a perfect size for the weekend.
It was very quiet-we got in late and slept in and I never heard them feeding animals or coming or going.
Julie gave us great recommendations for dinner (one22) and lent us umbrellas. She was very accommodating and easy to work with.
We would stay here again if we’re in the area!

Julie is an excellent host. Very friendly and offered great suggestions tailored to my interests. The Barndominium is great. Cozy with everything you could need for a peaceful getaway! I will definitely stay here again. The baby goats were an added bonus and an unforgettable treat!
Loved staying here

Staying on the farm was such a treat. The space was a peaceful place to land for the weekend after seeing a beautiful show at The Caverns. We enjoyed the waterfalls nearby and brunch at the Celtic Coffee House in town. We were also lucky enough to see three baby goats being born. Highly recommend staying here and would love to return.
We loved it. would definitely book again.
Best vacation spot ever!! Waterfalls were great!! Tullahoma is right in the middle of so many little treasures in TN

This place is why we will never do hotels again! Awesome, kind and personable hosts. Beautiful and exceptionally clean apartment. The peaceful atmosphere just can't be beat. This place didn't disappoint.

Julie and Herb’s beautiful Barn is a great place to stay! It is a working farm yet close to downtown Tullahoma and two famous distilleries as well as the amazing Rutledge Farms. The hosts are great folks warm, friendly and accommodating. We highly recommend staying in the beautifully decorated and nicely stocked apartment in The Barn.

Everything was perfect for us! Julie was great at communicating and made sure we were comfortable. Waterfall and hiking very close, great location. Very reasonably priced, also. The animals were well cared for and added so much to our experience. Grocery store less than 15 min. away and close to the quaint little town square. We had no problem finding the place due to our hosts’ excellent directions. Check-in was easy and check-out was low maintenance. Would be happy to stay again!
The Barn in a fantastic getaway! Everything was just perfect. Bed was super comfortable. Kitchen had everything I needed. Goats, cows, horses, cats and dogs! Heaven!
Great place to stay!

The Barn is a little hard to find because Google Maps took me completely took me to the wrong address. Fortunately, the hosts provided another way to find their place.
I was very impressed by how super clean the apartment was when I arrived. That is not trivial since you are out in the country. The other thing I noticed right away is how well equipped the apartment is. There’s everything from a full sized refrigerator to a washer and dryer. This would be a great place for a long term stay since you have everything you need.
Julie thoughtfully provided an array of snacks and drinks, including ingredients for s’mores. . I didn’t make any s’mores, but I did eat a couple of pieces of chocolate.
I’d definitely come back to stay again, especially when the baby goats are around!

Me and my pregnant wife had such an amazing experience out on the farm! Julie and her family made us feel so welcome! Definitely recommend to anyone looking to get away for even just a night you will not regret it!

Amazing place to stay in the area. Beautiful cozy barn apartment on the property. Julie was an amazing host who had recommendations for breathtaking trails in the area. Couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay. Will definitely recommend this place to anyone who is passing by or staying long term. Thanks again for making our first Airbnb a great experience!

My family and I loved our stay in the barn! It was clean as could be and fully stocked with everything we could have needed! We never did get around to using the fire pit, but it looked great. Julie was very welcoming and went above and beyond with introducing us to the animals and letting my daughter help with feeding them. We hope to visit again!

This place is amazing! The atmosphere is so peaceful and relaxing. All the animals and baby goats didn't hurt either. 😀 Rutledge Falls is a must see during your visit. I will definitely be staying here again when I re-visit the area.
Very cozy place. Very friendly hosts. Would definitely go back and stay again.
Great little place, not far from Tullahoma and Manchester. We enjoyed the baby goats and the host family is very friendly. Highly recommend.
Place was very clean and host was very responsive and kind. Would stay here again!

Julie and Herb’s place was absolutely perfect for us! We were in the area for a concert at the caverns and this farm stay couldn’t have been in a better location! It’s right in the middle of great places to see and great places to eat while still being far away enough from the city to feel secluded in the country! Such a beautiful location!

Thanks Julie and Herb for being so accommodating.
The apartment is lovely and comfortable and full of thoughtful and cute details.
The farm is relaxing and all the animals are adorable and friendly. The baby goats were definitely a highlight.
We had a wonderful, enjoyable stay.
Highly recommend.
Great place to go and relax. Holding baby goats was great!!

We were in the area for a show at the caverns. The farm was a great place to stay! Super clean. They even got us brownies (from a local shop), orange juice, bagels, and cream cheese. So thoughtful. The place was stocked with anything you may need. The bed was comfy. The extra pull-out bed was also pretty comfortable!!
The goats are super friendly! The mama goats loved being pet. Whoever books this spring will be in for a treat with baby goat snuggles! They were about to pop when we were there Apr.8-9th! Book it!!
Wonderful space. Perfect for a rural respite from the urban drag. Super clean, spacious and 20 minutes from a nice meal or remote fishing.
We had a very nice stay. Lots of nice touches. Close to several waterfalls and state parks.
Julie is a great host and the unit is cozy, very clean, well-stocked and very quiet! We highly recommend staying with Julie.
Excellent hospitality and beautiful place!
Julie was a great host, she greeted us upon arrival and gave us everything we needed! The barn was very clean and cute! I would recommend staying here!
overall good, people very nice.

A great place to just get away from everything for a bit. The hosts are great! They are very friendly and quick with recommendations in the area. The location had everything that we needed for our stay. The farm simply did not disappoint on any front!
Very clean! Wonderful host. They are so kind and the location is so nice. We hope to be back soon.
Perfect! Simply Perfect! Thank you Julie for your hospitality!

My husband and I visited The Barn at Dreamcatcher Farm for an anniversary get away weekend. I’m always hesitant about staying new places but as soon as we walked in I was happy with our decision. The apartment was very clean and everything was freshly laundered. We had everything we needed for our weekend and there were extra touches that Julie had added that made our visit more memorable . Julie was quick to respond and gave us some great advice on hikes, restaurants and biking. We intend to visit the farm again for a longer stay. Thanks for hosting us!!!

A friend and I chose Tullahoma as a mid-way meeting point for our overdue visit. I chose the Barn at Dreamcatcher Farm because everything looked so relaxing on the photos, and the photos are accurate! The farm animals are delightful. Accommodations were clean and exactly what we needed. I will recommend the Barn to friends who travel in this area!

Julie's Airbnb is located on a beautiful farm with sweeping views of blue skies, deep forests, sweet farm animals and dogs, and the perfect resting place with all the amenities. She was extremely accommodating of our requests, which I appreciated so much. We played basketball, fed the animals, and built a bonfire with her permission in the designated spot. It was lovely to hear the sweet melody of wind chimes off in the distance as we sat in front of the warm fire. It was as if the forest was singing to us. The Airbnb space was spacious, modern, very clean, and well appointed with a comfortable bed! Could not ask for a more perfect stay! Thank you!
This was a fantastic place to stay and the hospitality was wonderful. I highly recommend!

The barn was simply amazing. It was very peaceful and Julie is such a sweet host. Always stayed in touch to make sure we had all the things we needed. The place was very clean and had little extras that I didn’t even know I needed. I have already recommended this to everyone I have talked to!

Hands down the best Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at! The location is beautiful and close to nearby trails and waterfalls as well as great food places! The goats, cows and horses are all beautiful and you can tell they are enjoying life! I was able to hold the baby goats with my girlfriend and it was overall a fantastic experience and I would recommend staying here to anyone interested! Very nice room with snacks/drinks provided and even brought me strawberry cheesecake for my birthday! Great time!

100% the best Airbnb experience I’ve ever had! Gave great tips about where to go in the area, was warm and welcoming, beautiful inside and had many amazing animal friends outside! Would love to stay here again in the future! Wonderful hosts <3

Julie and her family are absolutely amazing host. Super clean and very accommodating. They made sure our family had the best Christmas ever! Also can’t leave out all the cute animals including the baby goats. I would definitely book there again when I come to the area!
Thank you for sharing your farm with us. We had so much fun playing with the animals. We are planning on staying there again!
We really enjoyed our stay. We would stay here again if we were back in the area.

This place and the host were amazing! So welcoming and went out of their way to help us research activities in local area. The property was beautiful, the apartment was sparkly clean and so well thought out! So fun to visit the animals we got lucky and got to hold baby goats! Loved. The host left gingerbread houses for my girls to decorate on the table when we arrived. Just super thoughtful! Book it! You won’t regret it.

The dreamcatcher barn is The place to stay. Great location when it comes to hiking, to get away from city noise and perfect for families who want little ones to see animals and learn some cool things about them. Our family had an amazing time at the barn and meeting Julie's family.
They were always looking after us and made sure we were comfortable before we even started our road trip. We were welcomed with a warm apartment on a cold night. Which was the perfect way to receive guests. Julie and her family provided tips on nearby parks were we could hike and see some waterfalls. They taught us how to care for some animals in the farm and we also had snuggle time with some newborn goats. We fed the horses, kitties and the goats. Such a great experience. We are looking forward to coming back again and catching up with everyone.
You will not be disappointed with Dreamcatcher farm!

Great Farm Stay. Julie’s place is amazing and really puts you in the center of a small farm life. We got to pet and feed cows, horses, and goats! There were even baby goats born one of the mornings we were there!! We loved our time there and this unique stay. The barn apartment has everything you need. Full kitchen, nice furniture and all working appliances. Would definitely recommend for an adventurous traveler looking for a stay with farm animals.
Julie's place was wonderful for our family. She patiently showed our kids how to engage with the animals, and we felt right at home from the beginning. We hope to be back soon!

The barn was an amazing stay! it was clean and beautifully decorated. the host were very friendly and helped make the trip wonderful.they went above and beyond to make sure my little ones were taken care of from toys, to sippy cups, and offered many things to help throughout our stay. the farm was beautiful and my daughter lived being able to see the animals everyday! I would definitely recommend staying here!
Very clean and comfortable room! Easy to find and close to the event we were attending.
I highly recommend staying at the farm! Extremely comfortable, well appointed, and clean. A great place to stay while fishing, or just a quiet get away. Hosts are super nice.

This Airbnb made us feel at home and was very relaxing. The hosts were very accommodating and welcoming! The airbnb was very clean and we really enjoyed being surrounded by the farm animals as well as feeding them carrots and apples which were provided by the owners!

You’ll love this precious studio in the barn. It’s spacious and just has all you can need for a relaxing retreat. Julie and her husband go beyond to make your stay wonderful. You’ll enjoy many places to hike and can spend time in nature . Love the small town warmness and great coffee houses. A must for travelers to experience Tullahoma💗 It’s a quick ride to Downtown Nashville.

Dreamcatcher Farm was awesome! Julie and family were so welcoming and went above and beyond in letting our kids hold baby goats, feed the horses and explore their farm. Their fire pit was awesome and the apartment was immaculate, full of little touches - like charger cables, that most hosts wouldn't think of. The farm was also so convenient to at least three breathtaking waterfalls/hikes, not to mention great restaurants, coffee shops, etc. It couldn't have been easier to find and navigate. We highly recommend Tullahoma's Celtic Cafe, the Luna Cafe (try their filled long Johns!), Piggy's Barbecue and The Book Shelf Used Books. What great finds! We'd love to come stay at the farm anytime!

Would highly recommend stay for great experience. Hosts are very friendly and accommodating, and easy to contact. Expect a clean and nicely decorated facility with everything you left behind at home! Full kitchen, large bathroom with washer/dryer. Close to local attractions and situated with beautiful views that you would expect on a farm! We plan on staying again in the future for sure!
